item.title: SLIP-PLATE - Shamir DEK Visualization on Plates (OneKey/TinySeed Style)
item.description: SLIP-PLATE is an open-source security tool that allows you to split a Data Encryption Key (DEK) using Shamir’s Secret Sharing and render the resulting shares as human-friendly, physical plates (OneKey/TinySeed style). With the recent transition to a PyPI package, the tool is now easier than ever to deploy and use for secure offline key management.
